problem.p: A block of mass m1, suspended by a string as shown in the figure, is released from rest at an unknown height H (point A). At the bottom of its trajectory, point B, it hits a block of mass m2 initially at rest. Block m1 stops and block m2 moves until it encounters a vertical circular track of radius R. There is no friction along block 2's trajectory.
If block 2 loses contact with the track at the angle \(\theta\), point C in the figure, what is the height H?
You may type "theta" for \(\theta\), m1 and m2 for m1 and m2.
